version_description:
Thanks for your suggestions, they help us make the App better. This version includes the following updates:

- Updating few parts in translation and audio translation

- Improving the presentation of the text of Tafsir

- Highlighting the searched keywords within the search results

- Improving Media Controller

- Option to take note for each verse of Quran

- Displaying date and time of creating bookmarks, favorites, and notes within the list

- Indicating the word "Allah" in the translation with different color

- And several other bug fixings and improvements

Thanks for your suggestions, they help us make the App better. This version includes the following updates:

- Updating few parts in translation and audio translation

- Improving Media Controller

- Option to take note for each verse of Quran

- Displaying date and time of creating bookmarks, favorites, and notes within the list

- Indicating the word "Allah" in the translation with different color

- And several other bug fixings and improvements

- Added new recitation by Motaz Aghaei (Tahdir)

- Improving the search within the Quran with less keywords (example: "Yu 27" for verse 27 of surah Yusuf or Yunus)

- More options in media control panel (Repetition Range and Play From/To)

- Supporting Quick Actions menu in iOS13

- Supporting Widget for Daily Ayah

- And several other bug fixings and improvements

We will be really grateful if you could review this version and rate us on the App Store to improve the application.
